name: Big Dipper
description: They say it's hard to find a place to call your own, but what if such a place was not uniquely yours? What if both of you were not willing to give it up? Big Dipper is a visual novel which tells a romantic story of the circumstances that brought two lovers together one fateful New Year's Eve.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 or Faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
